title: Disney Aladdin (2.0.0.4) [GOG]
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_disneys_aladdin_2.0.0.4.exe"
- Play

Genre: Action - Arcade - Platformer
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10), Mac OS X (10.9.0+) and Linux (Ubuntu 14.04, Ubuntu 16.04)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Features: single-player - controller support
Released: November 11, 1993
Size: 18 MB
Company: Virgin Games / Disney
Included goodies: Commemorative 16-Bit Poster Art
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/disney_aladdin

About: 
For years, Jafar, the Sultan's evil advisor, has sought a magic treasure - a single lamp that holds the key to the greatest power in the world. With his goal in sight, Jafar learns that only one person in the world can claim the magic lamp from the dreaded Cave of Wonders â€“ one whose rags hide a heart that is pure; a diamond in the rough!

Join Aladdin and his pet monkey, Abu, as they race through the marketplace toward their date with destiny. Watch as Jafar tricks our hero and his friend into retrieving the lamp from the dangerous Cave of Wonders. But, Aladdin and Abu outwit Jafar, releasing the power of the wacky blue Genie! Now, Aladdin will have the chance to spoil Jafarâ€™s devious plans and win the hand of the beautiful princess Jasmine. But it will take more than magic to make his wishes come trueâ€¦

Relive Aladdinâ€™s classic adventure as you travel through Agrabah, the Cave of Wonders and more to defeat Jafar and rescue Jasmine
Jump, fight, dodge and carpet-ride your way through this adventure, collecting gems along the way

Minimum system requirements - Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: 1.8 GHz
Memory: 1 GB RAM
Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9.0c and 256 MB VRAM
Mouse, Keyboard
